summary: Provides a test suite that validates AWS MediaLive channel and input management using mocked AWS services. Includes utilities to build configuration data and a comprehensive set of test cases for creating, describing, listing, updating, starting, stopping, and deleting MediaLive resources. Also contains placeholder tests for server interactions.
business_intent: Ensure reliable MediaLive integration by automatically testing all major operations against a simulated AWS environment, facilitating early detection of regressions and supporting continuous integration.
